title: Amazin' in their Awfulness: Breaking Down the Mets
itunes:title: Amazin' in their Awfulness: Breaking Down the Mets
description:
Devin Gordon joins the show to talk about his new book, So Many Ways to Lose: The Amazin' True Story of the New York Mets—The Best Worst Team in Sports. He talks about the inspiration for the book, the agony and ecstasy of rooting for an oft-losing, but sometimes winning, franchise and takes stock of the Wilpon era, the Madoff connection, and the prospects under new ownership.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
